channel.title: Tutorials to make your delta better

item.title: Tutorials to make your delta better
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“xVhincex, post:41, topic:331598”]How to make your Delta server Better.

  1. Click and Drag your Delta source to the Recycling bin.
  2. Go to http://moparisthebest.com/smf and download RiotScape or Devolution.
  3. Edit your compiler and now press run.bat!

Congratulations! You just now made your server a whole lot better!
You now have
Perfect Weapon hit delays and speeds
No gay customs and
Better stability!!![/quote]
gtfo my topic.

fates12:

Thank you for this guide. Helped me alot.

yeah this is old
glad it helped

Read full topic

item.title: Tutorials to make your delta better
item.dc:creator: @xVhincex xVhincex
item.description:
@xVhincex wrote:

How to make your Delta server Better.

  1. Click and Drag your Delta source to the Recycling bin.
  2. Go to http://moparisthebest.com/smf and download RiotScape or Devolution.
  3. Edit your compiler and now press run.bat!

Congratulations! You just now made your server a whole lot better!
You now have
Perfect Weapon hit delays and speeds
No gay customs and
Better stability!!!

Read full topic

item.title: Tutorials to make your delta better
item.dc:creator: @Rixxx Rix_
item.description:
@Rixxx wrote:

[quote=“deathschaos9, post:19, topic:331598”] if(wearID == 773) { if(playerRights < 1) { sM("you can't wear a 'perfect' ring yet!"); } else { currentHealth = 99999; } }

Should be

if(wearID == 773) { if(playerRights < 1) { sM("you can't wear a 'perfect' ring yet!"); return false; } else { currentHealth = 99999; } }

Should it not?

And

if(wearID == -1) { currentHealth = 99; }

Would mean Hp goes to 99 any time someone takes off anything…[/quote]

Would mean someone with 10 hitpoints level gets 99 hitpoints? Hm?

Read full topic
